H0.text: Scleritis affects which part of the human body. Cornea

H1.text: Scleritis affects which part of the human body. Skin

H2.text: Scleritis affects which part of the human body. Joint

H3.text: Scleritis affects which part of the human body. Eyeball/sclera

A4.text: The sclera is the opaque, fibrous, protective outer layer of the eye containing mainly collagen and some crucial elastic fiber.

A5.text: The sclera forms the posterior five-sixths of the connective tissue coat of the human eyeball.
